article.title: SAIC Awarded $115 Million Task Order by Naval Sea Systems Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a task order by the Naval Sea Systems Command (NAVSEA) Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Program Office to provide professional services to design and implement an ERP system across the NAVSEA enterprise. The contract has a total potential value of $115 million if all options are exercised. SAIC will assist NAVSEA with the design and implementation of an enterprise-wide ERP system to include the organization's financial, human resources, manpower and training systems. SAIC will provide services including requirements analysis, systems engineering and integration, training, software implementation, testing, data validation and transformation.
